synopsis.text: They say inheritance is a blessing, but for Hayato Kasukabe, it's a whole new challenge! After his beloved grandmother's passing, Hayato returns to his coastal hometown to find that he's inherited her run-down café, Café Terrace Familia. Eager to sell it off and return to his life in Tokyo, Hayato's plans are thwarted when he encounters five vivacious girls who claim to be his grandmother's 'family'. Determined to preserve their cherished home, the girls convince Hayato to give the café a second chance. As Hayato embarks on this unexpected journey to save the café, he rediscovers his affection for the charming seaside abode and the unruly yet lovable girls who inhabit it. Will Hayato and his newfound family succeed in reviving Café Terrace Familia, or will the café and its memories fade away forever? Join Hayato in this heartwarming rom-com adventure, where every cup of coffee brews a tale of love, friendship, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
